channel.title: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now
channel.description:
And say hello to pikachu! All of the current global moderators on MSCP are now blue starred with the pikachu rank. Please don't be confused with the global moderator rank on Moparisthebest.com. These are now separate ranks. Global moderators on Moparisthebest.com will not be able to moderate MoparScape, nor will MoparScape global moderators be able to moderate Moparisthebest.com. Some people may be global moderators on both.
Hopefully the new system makes more sense. We believe it will.
Thanks, MoparScape/Moparisthebest Administration

item.title: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Enough of this. I’m not going to enable more arguing in this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:157, topic:453037”]Also,[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=555889.msg4084728#msg4084728 date=1345697351]
Anyways it’s irrelevant, we already answered it.
[/quote]

So that’s the end of it.[/quote]

This. But not whats above since Ruby and me are neutral. Lool.

Read full topic
item.source: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now

item.title: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:155, topic:453037”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=555889.msg4084746#msg4084746 date=1345701077]
I’m just ‘stating facts’.
[/quote]
How mature of you.[/quote]By my books calling someone a little brat is pretty immature, but instead you said ‘thanks’ to him. Maybe learn to take a little criticism when you act like you know everything and someone points out you made a mistake.

Also,[quote=“Davidi2, post:151, topic:453037”]Anyways it’s irrelevant, we already answered it.[/quote]

So that’s the end of it.

Read full topic
item.source: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now

item.title: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Classic, post:147, topic:453037”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=555889.msg4084438#msg4084438 date=1345672427]
But bulbasaur is more super effective!

@Ruby - Coming from a member from 2011…
[/quote]
The thing is though, since 2010 you’ve been asking for help and being an all out moron/little brat, while Ruby is a more mature member than you are, and can give better input then you.

Stop acting like you’re some old member because you’re not, 2010 is nothing, compared to others. I know I’m probably going to look like a hypocrite but I’m just defending a member of this community, we’re all allowed to give input so I don’t see your point.[/quote]
And I should care about your input? I only talk like this to members who make such a big deal to things. I’m wrong, I’m wrong, end of discussion. Take a look at the messages above me and look at what you started.

Classic:

The thing is though, since 2010 you’ve been asking for help and being an all out moron/little brat, while Ruby is a more mature member than you are, and can give better input then you.

Asking for help? Last time I was asking for help and REALLY needed it was in 2010. And I already know Ruby’s more mature, I’m freaking 11 for gods sake. You guys act like since I’m 11 I should know this, know that, be like the mature in the whole world, blah.

Read full topic
item.source: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now

item.title: We say goodbye to our dear bulbasaur for now
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:151, topic:453037”][quote author=Classic link=topic=555889.msg4084452#msg4084452 date=1345673675]

But bulbasaur is more super effective!

@Ruby - Coming from a member from 2011…

The thing is though, since 2010 you’ve been asking for help and being an all out moron/little brat, while Ruby is a more mature member than you are, and can give better input then you.

Stop acting like you’re some old member because you’re not, 2010 is nothing, compared to others. I know I’m probably going to look like a hypocrite but I’m just defending a member of this community, we’re all allowed to give input so I don’t see your point.
[/quote]The fact remains that Ruby was still wrong… he wasn’t ‘giving input’ he was acting like he knew what he was talking about (ie, why we are doing this) when he didn’t. Obviously arham is being a hypocrite as well, but still. Anyways it’s irrelevant, we already answered it.[/quote]
We’re really going to start the again davidi2?

Read full topic

I know I’m probably going to look like a hypocrite but I’m just defending a member of this community, we’re all allowed to give input so I don’t see your point.[/quote]The fact remains that Ruby was still wrong… he wasn’t ‘giving input’ he was acting like he knew what he was talking about (ie, why we are doing this) when he didn’t. @Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Classic, post:147, topic:453037”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=555889.msg4084438#msg4084438 date=1345672427]
But bulbasaur is more super effective!

@Ruby - Coming from a member from 2011…
[/quote]
The thing is though, since 2010 you’ve been asking for help and being an all out moron/little brat, while Ruby is a more mature member than you are, and can give better input then you.

Stop acting like you’re some old member because you’re not, 2010 is nothing, compared to others. I know I’m probably going to look like a hypocrite but I’m just defending a member of this community, we’re all allowed to give input so I don’t see your point.[/quote]

Thanks, Classic :P.

[quote=“m1lkman, post:148, topic:453037”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=555889.msg4084444#msg4084444 date=1345673157]

But bulbasaur is more super effective!

@Ruby - Coming from a member from 2011…

Just because I’ve only been registered a year doesn’t mean I can’t have input? That’s like me bringing up the fact that you’re very young in an argument.
[/quote]

No you can’t. The only person allowed to have input is Tree. He has been around since the dawn of the internet.[/quote]

Lol’d.
